titles.title: Essential Worker Tax Parity Act of 2021
To exclude from gross income $10,200 in wages or net earnings of certain taxpayers for taxable year 2020.
Essential Worker Tax Parity Act of 2021

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Essential Worker Tax Parity Act of 2021
This bill excludes from the gross income of taxpayers whose adjusted gross income is less than $150,000 up to $10,200 of wages and self employment income earned in taxable years beginning in 2020.
